subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Chicago Cubs traded outfielder Félix Pie, formerly a prized prospect, to the Baltimore Orioles for the left-hander Garrett Olson and the minor league pitcher Henry Williamson. The 23-year-old Pie hit .241 in 43 games with the Cubs last season after batting .287 in 85 games in Class AAA.
